data.claim: 100% Match Designer Card specs: Frame 800x800, black fill. 3 circles with radial gradients (DC2626→B91C1C→7F1D1D→0A0A0A). Dark blob: 620x620 at -320,-320. Red TR: 850x850 at 320,-250. Red bottom: 950x950 at -150,300. Glass card: 520x600 at 140,100, fill #1F1F2380, 28px radius, 40px blur, #FFFFFF15 border.
